goals__remit:
BPI represents the UK’s recorded music industry. As a trade body, we champion the interests of our membership which includes more than 400 independent music companies and the UK’s major record companies – Universal Music, Sony Music, and Warner Music. Together, BPI’s members account for 85% of all music sold in the UK. 
 
BPI organises the BRIT Awards show, the Classic BRIT Awards show and the Hyundai Mercury Music Album of the Year Awards. 
 
Substantial proceeds from the BRIT Awards go to the BRIT Trust – the charitable arm of BPI – which has donated almost £20 million to charitable causes nationwide since its foundation in 1989.   
 
BPI co-owns the Official Charts Company in a joint venture with the Entertainment Retailers Association (ERA). The Official Charts Company is responsible for the commissioning, distribution, marketing and promotion of the UK’s industry standard music and video charts and sales data. 
 
BPI also maintains the industry standard for certifying Gold, Silver and Platinum sales awards.
